Name: Thornwood Guardian
Story Background: Legends speak of the ancient guardians of the primal forests, massive elemental beings that protect the sanctity of nature with unyielding determination.
Ability: Reach, Trample (This creature can block creatures with flying, and it can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Appearance Description: The Thornwood Guardian resembles a towering humanoid figure composed entirely of living, intertwined vines and branches. Its eyes glow with a serene green light, and its presence exudes an aura of untamed wilderness and potent natural magic.
